list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a length or portion of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had long periods of depression
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã có thời gian dài trầm cảm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the interval of time between successive occurrences of the same state in an oscillatory or cyclic phenomenon, such as a mechanical vibration, an alternating current, a variable star, or an electromagnetic wave.
a flow of blood and other material from the lining of the uterus, occurring in nonpregnant women at intervals of about 28 days between puberty and menopause and typically lasting for a few days.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy có thời gian của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a set of elements occupying an entire horizontal row in the periodic table.
a complex sentence, especially one consisting of several clauses, constructed as part of a formal speech or oration.
belonging to or characteristic of a past historical time, especially in style or design.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a splendid selection of period furniture
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một lựa chọn tuyệt vời của đồ nội thất thời kỳ
